repnme.cdata!:
Indonesia - Private Development Finance
            Company (PDFCI) Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The proposed credit will finance a
            three-year program of lending and investment commitments by
            PDFCI to finance specific development projects of private
            enterprises in Indonesia.
